title: Lord Heseltine says now is 'as good a time' as any to be made redundant ...
text: Lord Heseltine , the former Deputy Prime Minister and an economic adviser to David Cameron , has claimed that now is " as good a time " as any to be made redundant. Speaking about the Government â€™s decision not to do more to save the British
